RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Sononymph with Paketti Modifications
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: danoise & esaruoho
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: This tool adds Sononym integration to Renoise. Launch from the Tools/Instrument Box/Sample Editor/Sample Navigator etc menus, midimapping or keybinding. major fixes by Esa Ruoho
